attributes.action: Reduce interest rates on credit card and overdraft debt to 0%
attributes.background: During this unprecedented event in modern times many people are having to turn to debt to just manage.  The government should lobby financial institutions or pass a law to insist that interest rates are reduced to 0% or an interest rate linked flat rate to ensure vulnerable people are protected.
